t: Adventures in Homebrewing is Closing Tomorrow. - General Homebrew Discussion - American Homebrewers Association® Forum
s: March 24, 2022 - Adventures in Homebrewing was my go to place. Word from employees is that they are closing tomorrow at end of business. They were purchased a few months ago by the company that owns Northern Brewer and Midwest. Glad I cashed out my reward points recently.
